participant_1.background:
I value honesty and trust in my relationships.
I'm glad I have my favorite soap to help me feel better.
i m not a nice person.
I recently enjoyed a wine tour with my friends.
I am married, and my spouse is very patient with me when I get scared on roller coasters.

participant_2.background:
I live in a small town in the Midwest, USA.
I wear comfortable clothes that are easy to move around in
I like to eat apples because they are healthy and sweet.
my dad was a cop until he was killed.
My daily routine consists of applying for jobs and working on my own stories in the hopes that one day I'll be published.

content.text: Hello!
Hello!
How are you?
I am good! How about you?
I am well, thanks!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks, read, and watch tv.
Those are all great activities! I like to go for walks and read too.
Me too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read historical fiction and fantasy.
I like to read historical fiction too! What are some of your favorite books?
Some of my favorite historical fiction books are "The Pillars of the Earth" by Ken Follett, "The Count of Monte Cristo" by Alexandre Dumas, and "The Book Thief" by Markus Zusak.
I have read "The Count of Monte Cristo" and "The Book Thief"! I really enjoyed both of them.
I'm glad you enjoyed them! They are both great books.
What are some of your favorite fantasy books?
Some of my favorite fantasy books are "The Lord of the Rings" by J.R.R. Tolkien, "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" by Douglas Adams, and "The Chronicles of Narnia" by C.S. Lewis.
I have read all of those books! I really enjoyed them too.
I'm glad you enjoyed them! They are all great books.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I also like to watch tv, play video games, and spend time with my friends and family.
Those are all great hobbies! I like to watch tv and play video games too.
Me too! What are some of your favorite tv shows and video games?
Some of my favorite tv shows are "The Office", "Parks and Recreation", and "The Simpsons". Some of my favorite video games are "The Legend of Zelda", "Super Mario Bros.", and "Minecraft".
I love "The Office" and "Parks and Recreation"! I have never played "Minecraft" but I have heard good things about it.
"Minecraft" is a great game! You should definitely give it a try.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome!
It was nice talking to you!
You too
